title: Quickie Quiche
ingredients: ['375g ready-rolled shortcrust pastry', '100g lean ham, sliced medium-thick and cut into small pieces', '4 spring onions, sliced into rounds', '2 eggs', '150ml semi-skimmed milk', '4 tbsp single or whipping cream (or use extra milk)', '100g extra-mature Cheddar cheese, grated']
